structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Interest rate and maturity of bonds.
law.text: Bonds may be issued bearing interest at a rate or rates or method of determining rates, payable at least annually, and shall be executed in a manner and be payable at times not exceeding forty (40) years from the date of issue and at the place or places as the city legislative body determines.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 21, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 11. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2741l-4, 2741l-26.
